description: Debug JS, TS, Python, Go, Dart, C/CPP, Rust, CoffeeScript, Lua
toast.box.reload.message: Extensions are successfully installed. Please reload VSCode to take effect.
error.extract.extension-2: Cannot extract extension: {0}. Access temporary directory denied.
error.extract.extension-3: Cannot extract extension: {0}. Extension zip file not found.
error.env.platform.not.supported: Your operating system is not supported yet.
config.fileDirectoryAsCwd: Whether to use the directory of the file to be excuted as the working directory.
config.extensionPromptBehavior: Controls how often to show extension installation prompts
config.extensionPromptBehavior.once: Show each extension installation prompt only once per project
config.extensionPromptBehavior.always: Always show extension installation prompts when opening unsupported files
config.skippedExtensions: List of extensions to never show installation prompts for (overrides extensionPromptBehavior)
config.promptShownExtensions: List of extensions that have already shown installation prompts in this project (used when extensionPromptBehavior is 'once')
toast.settings.missing.extensions: The following extensions are required for debugging: {0}. Do you want to install them now?
error.command.extensions: Failed to start {0} debugging. Please make sure you have installed the required extensions for debugging this type of file.
